reviewText: I bought this by mistake & really couldn't make much sense of it. Very arty.
You really must see this one...why can't American TV be this great??  Original story, great acting straight down the line.....buy this!
Great series, acting, locale, and premise.  Enjoyed it!

Dark, creepy mystery thriller. This British four episode series set in a London Victorian era built house turned into flats(apartments) with a collection of very different from each other tenants  will not be for everyone expecting a simple Hollywood type story. The plot is quite complicated so needs plenty of concentration and has many fascinating twists, turns and flashbacks leading up to the finale. The BBC which made the series excels in this type of thing. Highly recommended.
good series with a couple of nice twists  the intrigue around who killed the body in the attic and why  is well maintained  and has a pretty cool conclusion  Enjoyed a LOT
